document_data.name: Dragonriders Club
document_data.mainbody: The '''Dragonriders Club''' was a private club in [[Suzail]] owned by [[Tress]]. It was the favorite nighttime hangout of many nobles and wealthy merchants.
document_data.Location: The club was located in northwest Suzail.
document_data.Description:
The club's primary attraction was its beautiful [[Mask Dance|Mask Dancers]], who danced on stages wearing nothing but a mask. During the daytime hours, the club offered meals and services such as haircuts and baths to its members. [[Amarune Whitewave]] danced at the club and was one of the most popular dancers.

In [[1479 DR]] the club was heavily damaged during a brawl between nobles.
